about_the_game:
Explore the adventurous world of Gloop, a retro 2D platformer that blends nostalgic gameplay with a unique companion mechanic.

You play as a young girl exploring the depths of an abandoned mine where you meet Gloop, a slime-like creature who becomes your trusted ally against dangerous foes. Work together through challenging levels to defeat the mage that has haunted these mines in this lighthearted and mysterious adventure. 

Features:

  • Classic Platformer action: Run, jump and explore the depths of the mines

  • Companion abilities: Use Gloop to attack any enemies that may attack you.

  • Retro style: Pixel art visuals for a simple yet nostalgic feel.

  • Accessible gameplay: Whether you are a keyboard or a controller player, enjoy all levels on your top preference.

Development in Progress:

The game is still being developed, and we’re actively working to make it the best it can be. Feedback from players is incredibly important to us, and we’re excited to hear your thoughts as we continue to improve and expand the game.
